document.docAuthor: Evenhuis, Neal L., O’Hara, James E., Pape, Thomas & Pont, Adrian C.

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE SPECIES
:
Phaenicia concinna Robineau-Desvoidy, 1863
[=
Musca sericata Meigen, 1826
], by subsequent designation ( Townsend, 1916: 8 ).

CURRENT STATUS: Junior synonym of
Lucilia Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830
[ teste Rognes (1991: 147) ].

REMARKS: There are two original spellings of this genus-group name in Robineau-Desvoidy (1863b) :
Phaenicia
(page 750) and Phoenicia (page 900). Acting as First Reviser, we select
Phaenicia
as the correct original spelling.
